channel.title: Moving Objects
channel.description: ok well, i got elionscape server source, and it's kind of varrok based, so all shops are in varrok, all training things are in varrok. (all in the sq) and i wanted to change it to a different town.. how would i do this?

item.title: Moving Objects
item.dc:creator: @dztommeh dztommeh
item.description:
@dztommeh wrote:

[quote=“Taylor John0, post:4, topic:130719”]Sorry, thinking of Medieval Scape.
Gimme a sec, I’ll find it.

No I wasn’t. I knew it came from Elion, cuz i taught myself how to add global objects(unlike most people)
It was down a bit, but towards the top.

[code]public void NewObjects() { // Pk4r Pk4r ( non laggy !)

makeGlobalObject(3213, 3434, 411, 0, 10);//prayer
makeGlobalObject(3207, 3430, 2513, 0, 10);//range
makeGlobalObject(3211, 3424, 2873, 0, 10);//atk
makeGlobalObject(3212, 3424, 2874, 0, 10);//str
makeGlobalObject(3213, 3424, 2875, 0, 10);//def
makeGlobalObject(3208, 3425, 2213, 0, 10);//bank
makeGlobalObject(3208, 3424, 2213, 0, 10);//bank
makeGlobalObject(3207, 3429, 2465, 0, 10);//magic portal
makeGlobalObject(3203, 3428, 7273, 0, 10);//barrows portal
makeGlobalObject(2825, 3809, 2587, -1, 10);//chest
makeGlobalObject(2738, 5087, 6409, -1, 10);
makeGlobalObject(3201, 3428, 7324, 0, 10);//big/secret zone
}[/code][/quote]

That doesnt tell you how
try this

makeGlobalObject(X cord, Y cord, Item ID, 0, 10);//DeaDZ.com

Read full topic

item.title: Moving Objects
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

Sorry, thinking of Medieval Scape.
Gimme a sec, I’ll find it.

No I wasn’t. I knew it came from Elion, cuz i taught myself how to add global objects(unlike most people)
It was down a bit, but towards the top.

[code]public void NewObjects() { // Pk4r Pk4r ( non laggy !)

makeGlobalObject(3213, 3434, 411, 0, 10);//prayer
makeGlobalObject(3207, 3430, 2513, 0, 10);//range
makeGlobalObject(3211, 3424, 2873, 0, 10);//atk
makeGlobalObject(3212, 3424, 2874, 0, 10);//str
makeGlobalObject(3213, 3424, 2875, 0, 10);//def
makeGlobalObject(3208, 3425, 2213, 0, 10);//bank
makeGlobalObject(3208, 3424, 2213, 0, 10);//bank
makeGlobalObject(3207, 3429, 2465, 0, 10);//magic portal
makeGlobalObject(3203, 3428, 7273, 0, 10);//barrows portal
makeGlobalObject(2825, 3809, 2587, -1, 10);//chest
makeGlobalObject(2738, 5087, 6409, -1, 10);
makeGlobalObject(3201, 3428, 7324, 0, 10);//big/secret zone
}[/code]

item.title: Moving Objects
item.dc:creator: @SmokeSome SmokeSome
item.description:
@SmokeSome wrote:

heh yeah it is a pretty fun server to mess around with imo

but sadly i don’t see the objects in client.java you’re talking about.

Read full topic

item.title: Moving Objects
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

Elionscape v1 to free xd
Lol had to say, I’ve got it for a screw around server. If you notice, right at the top of the client.java, there’s a crapload of added objects. Just change their coords.

Read full topic
